v8:item.v8:content: Click "Set up data synchronization" if it is required to synchronize data of this application with other or to set up a distributed infobase. Data can be synchronized automatically on schedule or on-demand at any time.

Contact the infobase administrator if it is required to synchronize data of this application with other or to set up a distributed infobase. Data can be synchronized automatically on schedule or on-demand at any time.
The prefix is automatically added to the code of catalog items and document numbers to distinguish which of the programs they were introduced, and to avoid duplication of data
